languages.text: While Marazhai is {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, his {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +15.
languages.original_text: Пока на Маражая действует {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} увеличиваются на 15.

traits.locale_text: While Marazhai is bleeding, his Fellowship and Willpower are increased by +15.
